create-row.description: Creates a new row in the selected table.

find-row.description: Find specific rows in the selected table using a column match search.

get-row.description: Retrieves a single row by specified ID.

get-table.description: Get structure and details of a specific table (e.g., columns, schema).

list-tables.description: List tables in a selected document.

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of results to return.

update-row.description: Updates an existing row in the selected table.

upsert-row.description: Creates a new row or updates an existing one if it matches key columns.

new-row-created.description: Triggers when a new row is added to the selected table.
